quranic_verses.arabic_text: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ ۚ لَّهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ
quranic_verses.english_translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth.
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: أَقِمِ الصَّلَاةَ لِدُلُوكِ الشَّمْسِ إِلَىٰ غَسَقِ اللَّيْلِ وَقُرْآنَ الْفَجْرِ ۖ إِنَّ قُرْآنَ الْفَجْرِ كَانَ مَشْهُودًا
quranic_verses.english_translation: Establish prayer at the decline of the sun until the darkness of the night and the dawn recitation. Indeed, the dawn recitation is ever witnessed.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
quranic_verses.english_translation: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: إِنَّنِي أَنَا اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنَا فَاعْبُدْنِي وَأَقِمِ الصَّلَاةَ لِذِكْرِي
quranic_verses.english_translation: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: فَإِذَا قَضَيْتُمُ الصَّلَاةَ فَاذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ قِيَامًا وَقُعُودًا وَعَلَىٰ جُنُوبِكُمْ
quranic_verses.english_translation: When you have completed the prayer, remember Allah standing, sitting, and lying on your sides.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: اتْلُ مَا أُوحِيَ إِلَيْكَ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ وَأَقِمِ الصَّلَاةَ ۖ إِنَّ الصَّلَاةَ تَنْهَىٰ عَنِ الْفَحْشَاءِ وَالْمُنكَرِ
quranic_verses.english_translation: Recite what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish prayer. Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: وَاسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ وَإِنَّهَا لَكَبِيرَةٌ إِلَّا عَلَى الْخَاشِعِينَ
quranic_verses.english_translation: And seek help through patience and prayer, and indeed, it is difficult except for the humbly submissive.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ
quranic_verses.english_translation: O you who believe! Seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: وَأَقِمِ الصَّلَاةَ طَرَفَيِ النَّهَارِ وَزُلَفًا مِّنَ اللَّيْلِ ۚ إِنَّ الْحَسَنَاتِ يُذْهِبْنَ السَّيِّئَاتِ
quranic_verses.english_translation: And establish prayer at the two ends of the day and at the approach of the night. Indeed, good deeds do away with misdeeds.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اصْبِرُوا وَصَابِرُوا وَرَابِطُوا وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
quranic_verses.english_translation: O you who believe! Persevere in patience and constancy; vie in such perseverance; strengthen each other; and fear Allah that you may prosper.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: وَعِبَادُ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ الْجَاهِلُونَ قَالُوا سَلَامًا
quranic_verses.english_translation: And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them, they say words of peace.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: يَا بُنَيَّ أَقِمِ الصَّلَاةَ وَأْمُرْ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَانْهَ عَنِ الْمُنكَرِ وَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا أَصَابَكَ
quranic_verses.english_translation: O my son, establish prayer, enjoin what is right, forbid what is wrong, and be patient over what befalls you.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: فَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
quranic_verses.english_translation: So be patient over what they say and exalt Allah with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting.

quranic_verses.arabic_text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِّنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ
quranic_verses.english_translation: Indeed, your Lord knows that you stand in prayer almost two-thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and so do a group of those with you.

hadith.arabic_text: الصَّلاةُ نُورٌ، والصَّدَقَةُ بُرْهانٌ، والصَّبْرُ ضِياءٌ
hadith.english_translation: Prayer is light, charity is proof, and patience is illumination.

hadith.arabic_text: بَيْنَ الرَّجُلِ وَبَيْنَ الشِّرْكِ وَالْكُفْرِ تَرْكُ الصَّلاةِ
hadith.english_translation: Between a man and shirk and kufr is the abandonment of prayer.

hadith.arabic_text: إِذَا نُودِيَ لِلصَّلاةِ أَدْبَرَ الشَّيْطَانُ وَلَهُ ضُرَاطٌ
hadith.english_translation: When the call to prayer is made, Satan turns away with a loud noise.

hadith.arabic_text: أَوَّلُ مَا يُحَاسَبُ عَلَيْهِ الْعَبْدُ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ الصَّلاةُ
hadith.english_translation: The first thing for which a servant will be held accountable on the Day of Resurrection is prayer.

hadith.arabic_text: الصَّلَوَاتُ الْخَمْسُ وَالْجُمُعَةُ إِلَى الْجُمُعَةِ كَفَّارَةٌ لِمَا بَيْنَهُنَّ
hadith.english_translation: The five daily prayers and Friday prayer to Friday prayer are expiation for what is between them.

hadith.arabic_text: مَنْ تَوَضَّأَ فَأَحْسَنَ الْوُضُوءَ ثُمَّ صَلَّى رَكْعَتَيْنِ يُقْبِلُ عَلَيْهِمَا بِقَلْبِهِ وَوَجْهِهِ وُجِبَتْ لَهُ الْجَنَّةُ
hadith.english_translation: Whoever performs ablution perfectly and then prays two rak'ahs with his heart and face focused on them, Paradise becomes obligatory for him.

hadith.arabic_text: مَا مِنْ مُسْلِمٍ يَتَوَضَّأُ فَيُحْسِنُ وُضُوءَهُ ثُمَّ يَقُومُ فَيُصَلِّي رَكْعَتَيْنِ مُقْبِلٌ عَلَيْهِمَا بِقَلْبِهِ وَوَجْهِهِ إِلاَّ وَجَبَتْ لَهُ الْجَنَّةُ
hadith.english_translation: No Muslim performs ablution perfectly and then stands and prays two rak'ahs with his heart and face focused on them except that Paradise becomes obligatory for him.
And whoever is patient, Allah will make him patient.

hadith.arabic_text: عَجَبًا لِأَمْرِ الْمُؤْمِنِ إِنَّ أَمْرَهُ كُلَّهُ خَيْرٌ وَلَيْسَ ذَاكَ لِأَحَدٍ إِلَّا لِلْمُؤْمِنِ
hadith.english_translation: How wonderful is the affair of the believer, for his affairs are all good, and this applies to no one but the believer.
